body.description: Take your tunes on the go with the powerful JBL Flip 5. Our lightweight Bluetooth speaker goes anywhere. Bad weather? Not to worry. With its waterproof design, you can rock out to our signature sound Rain or shine. Move more, pair two JBL party boost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple JBL party boost-compatible speakers to create a bigger party. Enjoy more than 12 hours of play time for your favorite music. Stand it vertical or horizontal and be bold with your choice of 11 vibrant colors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JBL FLIP5 Sounds Better Than Ever Feel your music. Flip 5's all new racetrack-shaped driver delivers high output. Enjoy booming bass in a compact package

JBL FLIP5 Bring the Party Anywhere Don't sweat the small stuff like charging your battery. Flip 5 gives you more than 12 hours of playtime. Keep the music going longer and louder with JBL's signature sound

JBL FLIP5 Make a Splash with IPX7 Waterproof Design Bring your speakers anywhere. Pool party? Perfect. Sudden cloudburst? Covered. Bash on the beach? Flip 5 is IPX7 waterproof up to three-feet deep for fearless outdoor entertainment

A Rainbow of Colors With 11 distinct color options, the Flip 5 is anything but boring. Broaden your spectrum with JBL’s signature sound Bluetooth Connectivity Wirelessly connect your favorite devices Tough as it sounds Durable fabric material and rugged rubber housing keep the Flip 5 safe while you let loose in the great outdoors. Crank it up with PartyBoost PartyBoost allows you to pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or multiple multiple compatible speakers for big sound

JBL FLIP5 Bold sound for every adventure Take your tunes on the go with the powerful JBL Flip 5. Our lightweight Bluetooth speaker goes anywhere. Bad weather? Not to worry. With its waterproof design, you can rock out to our signature sound rain or shine. Move more. Pair two JBL PartyBoost-compatible speakers together for stereo sound or link multiple speakers to create a bigger party. Enjoy more than 12 hours of play time for your favorite music. Stand it vertical or horizontal and be bold with your choice of 11 vibrant colors

Which JBL Portable is Right for You? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new go to speaker!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The JBL FLIP 5 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker stands as a testament to superior audio engineering and design, making it a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their listening experience. Its performance is nothing short of impressive, and it's easy to see why it's received such high praise.First and foremost, the sound quality of the JBL FLIP 5 is outstanding. JBL, known for its audio excellence, has packed this portable speaker with rich, powerful sound that belies its size. Whether you're listening to music, podcasts, or audiobooks, the clarity and depth of the audio are exceptional. The bass is punchy and robust, which is particularly notable in a speaker of this size.Durability and portability are where the FLIP 5 truly shines. Its waterproof design is a game-changer for those who love to take their music outdoors, be it to the beach, pool, or just in the shower. The speaker's rugged construction ensures it can withstand the elements and accidental splashes, making it ideal for all kinds of adventures.The Bluetooth connectivity is seamless, offering quick and stable pairing with a variety of devices. This feature enhances its utility as a portable speaker, allowing for effortless streaming from smartphones, tablets, or any Bluetooth-enabled device.Battery life is another area where the JBL FLIP 5 excels. It provides hours of continuous playtime, ensuring that your music keeps going as long as your day does. This reliability makes it perfect for long outdoor excursions or parties.In conclusion, the JBL FLIP 5 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker is an exceptional product that delivers on all fronts. Its combination of excellent sound quality, robust build, waterproof design, easy connectivity, and long battery life makes it a standout in the portable speaker market. It's no wonder this speaker comes highly recommended for anyone looking for a high-quality, versatile audio experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might be small but awesome speaker!!!
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought one of these JBL flip 5 Bluetooth speakers when he was out of town working so his work crew could listen to music while working. Well when he came home I borrowed his to take to work, I am a nurse at a small nursing home and my residents love to listen to music they will come out of their rooms and sit at their doorways so they can hear my music from my flip 5 speaker that I sit on top of my med cart in the hallway and all my residents can hear such great quality music from such a little device. I will even dance in the hallway with them even if they are in wheelchairs or can stand. It is amazing what some good peppy music does for even the elderly people, I can see their whole attitudes change and the smiles on their faces are priceless. One resident that recently passed away from COVID, was sitting in her doorway months ago as I had my flip 5 on and music playing and I asked her who was her favorite musician or song and I like to fell out when this elderly Caucasian female said Michael Jackson and song was Billie Jean so I looked it up on my phone and played it for her and she was in a wheelchair but she still patted her foot to the music and tapped her hand and fingers on her table and at times I could hear her singing along and this made me so happy to do this for her we had a great time that Sunday afternoon and a memory I will never forget This awesome little cute speaker charges up quickly just a few hours and good to go and I have used mine for a whole 8 plus shift even if not playing music it would still be on and I have yet to hear any low battery beeps etc. My husband loves that they are waterproof because of him working outside in the dirt and rain. He said what sold him on buying one for him was a friend he worked with had one also and forgot his hanging on the basket on a line truck and the next morning he got it and had dirt and mud on it so he took it over to the water hose and washed it off and all the dirt and mud can completely off and the water didn't do anything to this flip 5 speaker he shook it as dry as he could get it then hung it back on his bucket on his line truck and turned it on and worked just as good as before. I say if u love music and love even sharing music with others this little speaker is highly recommended by me and my husband. It is simple to connect to his and my iPhones. The buttons on the speakers are very easy to press and can be easily seen on the speaker. Also the volume can be adjusted by my iPhone volume buttons too. It makes the cutest sound when connecting to my phone which tells me is is connected. Never had an issue with it disconnecting for no reason. The range is good that is the range that my cell phone is from the speaker never had an issue with that I play music on it and put my cell in my scrub pocket and I am up and down the hallways and in rooms with doors closed and music keeps playing. I can't think of one problem/issue or complaint about this JBL flip 5 speaker. Worth the money and my residents appreciate me spending this small amount of money for them to have some happiness in their day and I do too. My husband bought his from a person advertising a used one wanting to sell when he was up north working I think he bought his for $50 dollars but I always use my Amazon prime so in case I don't like something I buy or have an issue I can return free and free 2 day shipping. And not very much more did I pay here for mine. I got pink and it is a pale pink not bright pink. I like it. I don't know if my managers at the nursing home that I work at would care or not about me playing music over my speaker but even if they did I would probably still sneak and do it because of the reactions I get from my elderly confused residents the smiles on their faces is why I would go against what a manager tells me not to do and do it anyway. These residents don't get much joy to be honest esp since COVID and isolation since middle of March 2020. They are depressed because they can not see (except through a closed window in their rooms) and can not touch their loved ones we that work there and love everyone of our residents don't replace the touch and hugs ans kisses they would be getting from the people they love the most in this world their children and grandchildren and even great grandchildren we have had residents pass away and they and their families haven't seen or touched since COVID and these are precious memories they can never get back it is depressing to me and I play music to keep all our minds off this depressing situation we are in right now and this little speaker helps me do this and is powerful enough to be heard from my med cart all the way down hallways and inside rooms. So even the residents that are bedridden can still hear some good music. So if u like good quality sound that can come from a small well built Bluetooth speaker that won't break your wallet then please buy this one. It also has a rope handle that my husband uses to hang his off the side of his bucket and it be out of his way. He is a lineman and stands in a bucket with limited room up high off the ground sometimes all day long so the rope handle is strong enough to hang this Light weight speaker from a hook and no worries of it breaking. Also I have accidentally dropped my speaker out of my nursing bad onto the cement floor in the nursing home and scared me because I would have been sick if it had broke my awesome speaker but turned it on and worked as usual I dropped it outside in the parking lot and no issues. Hope my review helps you realize this speaker is a good buy and u will be happy u did buy this one. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JBL Flip 5 is a very good speaker!
reviews.reviewText: The JBL Flip 5 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker in black is a stellar choice for anyone seeking a combination of portability and powerful sound. Its waterproof design ensures durability and reliability, making it perfect for outdoor adventures. The seamless Bluetooth connectivity and impressive battery life make it a go-to option for music on the go. With its punchy bass and clear, dynamic sound, the JBL Flip 5 excels in delivering an immersive listening experience, all packed in a conveniently small form. Whether at home or on the move, this speaker is a true performer that consistently exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best affordable speaker you'll find!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this speaker. I got my husband one a couple years ago and this year he gifted me this pink one.-The sound quality is amazing.-Super easy to connect to bluetooth devices.-Great battery life.We've had Bose speakers in the past but find JBL just as good and at a much more reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to order/reorder several times to get the color I wanted, Amazon kept sending a different color (I know, silly, but I wanted teal). I finally got this. At first I was using with my tablet and listening to a talk that was on video, and the sound kept skipping. I was worried that it was the speaker, but turns out, through my tablet, the WiFi was having issues, and although the tablet alone worked fine, also attaching to the speaker caused issues. This works great on my phone, however, where the LTE can cover any buffering or other issues that happens with the WiFi. The sound is great, and it can get loud enough to hear in another room if needed. I can also have my phone not right next to it and it still work (50+ feet away). I don't know what the range is, I haven't tested.
A bateria é ótima, nunca falha a música e é muito prática. Super recomendo!
Som límpido com graves potentes. Bateria com grande duração. Produto de excelente qualidade como todos da JBL
Bonita, tamanho bom, ótima qualidade de som com também ótima durabilidade

reviews.reviewTitle: Eco Harmony Meets Dynamic Sound: JBL Flip 5 Eco Bluetooth Speaker
reviews.reviewText: The JBL Flip 5 Eco Bluetooth Speaker has amplified my listening experience while contributing to a greener world, and I'm excited to award it a perfect five-star rating. This speaker offers an exceptional blend of sustainable design, powerful sound, and versatile portability, making it a must-have accessory for both music enthusiasts and environmentally conscious individuals.From the very first note, the JBL Flip 5 Eco Bluetooth Speaker's capabilities shine through. The speaker's eco-friendly construction and commitment to quality reflect the brand's dedication to delivering an audio experience that resonates with both sound and sustainability.The speaker's use of 90% recycled plastic is a standout feature. This environmentally friendly approach not only reduces plastic waste but also sets an example for responsible design in the tech industry.The waterproof design is a game-changer for outdoor and on-the-go use. Whether I'm by the pool, at the beach, or on a hike, I can enjoy my favorite tunes without worrying about water damage.The dynamic sound quality of the JBL Flip 5 Eco Speaker is remarkable. The speaker delivers rich bass, crisp highs, and balanced midrange tones, allowing me to appreciate the full spectrum of my favorite music.The forest green color adds a touch of nature-inspired style to the speaker. It's a refreshing and calming choice that complements outdoor settings.The Flip 5 Eco's portability is noteworthy. Its compact size and durable build make it easy to carry, ensuring that I can enjoy high-quality audio anywhere I go.The JBL brand's dedication to innovation and sustainability is evident in this speaker. The combination of design, sound quality, portability, and eco-friendly materials creates an audio accessory that truly harmonizes with the environment.In conclusion, the JBL Flip 5 Eco Bluetooth Speaker is a five-star audio companion that resonates with both sound and sustainability. Its use of recycled plastic, waterproof design, dynamic sound quality, stylish color, and portable build make it an essential accessory for music enthusiasts and eco-conscious individuals alike. Whether you're on a nature adventure or hosting a backyard gathering, this eco-friendly speaker is the perfect choice that has earned its five-star rating through its exceptional design and environmentally enhancing benefits.
